Transpile from ES.Next back to ES.now

Type ES Harmony code in the left box. The transpiled version (using Harmonizr project) will be shown in the right box.

The above code editor is based on CodeMirror.

Using Esprima version .

Esprima is created by Ariya Hidayat. Follow @ariyahidayat on Twitter.
